## ğŸ” Quality Checklist

### Code

- [ ] ESLint passes without errors (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Production build successful (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No `any` type added
- [ ] No `console.log` (only `console.error` in error handlers)
- [ ] No `TODO`, `FIXME`, `XXX` comments

### Tests

- [ ] All tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] New tests added for new features
- [ ] Coverage maintained or improved (`npm run test:coverage`)
- [ ] Vitest patterns used (not Jasmine)

### Angular Standards

- [ ] Standalone components only
- [ ] Modern control flow (`@if`, `@for`, `@switch`)
- [ ] Signals for state management
- [ ] `inject()` instead of constructor injection
- [ ] `ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush`

### Documentation

- [ ] README updated if necessary
- [ ] Clear comments in code
- [ ] Technical documentation up to date

### Security & Performance

- [ ] Clean `npm audit`
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets
- [ ] Acceptable bundle size
